title: How Kids Learn V - Los Angeles
desc: Preparing Youth for Work and Career Success ? ? The How Kids Learn (HKL) V conference is dedicated to providing those who are interested in improving youth outcomes with thought-provoking, educational opportunities. This includes access to national thinkers and researchers, innovative practitioners, and networking opportunities.?? This conference will focus on the importance and strategies to promote career awareness, the development of workforce skills, and work-based learning.? The target audience includes school- and community-based program providers (K-12) and advocates for workforce development. This includes educators, youth program leaders, funders, and policymakers.? To learn more, visit? http://howkidslearn.org/ .
